channel.title: [object][group]
channel.description: A frivolous cartoonist in East Anglia

item.title: Notes for November 2025
item.description: I explain how I wrote a short story called A Reporter of Rare Discoveries which is an intricately interconnected tale and some updates on the Adventures of Stilton backgrounds and settings and a little publication I made called the Snooze Paper
item.author: lisa@objectgroup.uk
item.category: perspective drawing interconnected tales in reporter of rare discovereies The Adventures of Stilton backgrounds settings snooze paper history

item.title: Notes for October 2025
item.description: The Adventures of Stilton has comic backgrounds that are being drawn from the point of view of mice who are innocent to the world and also from the point of view that the person drawing them has to enjoy the process and so some history of drawing really helps find a balance
item.author: lisa@objectgroup.uk
item.category: background drawing Milt Gross Codex Aureus of Lorsch Saint-Sever Beatus The Adventures of Stilton

item.title: Notes for September 2025
item.description: After drawing some characters it isn't obvious what they are going feel like to draw over and over so character sheets where you can try the character out from different angles and are perfect to familiarise yourself but there is jeopardy as you can fall in or out of love with drawing a character
item.author: lisa@objectgroup.uk
item.category: the adventures of stilton character sheets

item.title: Notes for August 2025
item.description: An introduction to a new comic called the Adventures of Stilton and the heart of the story and then a few of the ways to create new character outlines so the characters look different from each other
item.author: lisa@objectgroup.uk
item.category: the adventures of stilton character design process

item.title: Notes for July 2025
item.description: Attending a comic conference called MACC-POW and all the ways that was fun
item.author: lisa@objectgroup.uk
